abstract: The company’s chief, Paul S. Otellini, attributed the results to strong corporate demand for Intel’s most advanced technology and the surge of mobile devices.
snippet: The company’s chief, Paul S. Otellini, attributed the results to strong corporate demand for Intel’s most advanced technology and the surge of mobile devices.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Intel said that the modernization of data centers — the engines behind cloud computing — were responsible for the strong worldwide sales the chip maker reported Wednesday.

headline.main: Intel Posts Profit That Beats Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Sales Up 21%, Intel Posts Profit That Beats Forecasts
